TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_tmi, title = tmi, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/tmi} }

S.FORM: == tmi == tmi qani ga blak balay ngiqun. ana su ksosan ana su payang ga blaq ngiqun kwara. qmwax qeqaya' lgun tmi' mucing sa bnkis. pgyan ru ya qu te qsahuy nya' galan sgrgur qmwax qeqaya'.
== tmi == tmi qani ga blak balay ngiqon. ana so ksosan ana so payang ga blaq ngiqon kwara. qmwax qeqaya' lgon tmi' mocing sa bnkis. pgyan ro ya qo te qsahoy nya' galan sgrgor qmwax qeqaya'.
